articles.title: Woman convicted of fraud after living under a stolen identity for more than 20 years
articles.description:
Prosecutors say Lina Maria Orovio-Hernandez collected around $400,000 in stolen benefits and obtained multiple state IDs.

The post Woman convicted of fraud after living under a stolen identity for more than 20 years appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Lina Maria Orovio-Hernandez convicted of fraud after 20 years using a stolen identity.
She collected approximately $400,000 in stolen benefits and obtained multiple state IDs.
Her conviction highlights ongoing issues with identity theft and fraud in Boston.
